name: DeleteAsanaTag
description:
Delete a specific tag in Asana with its unique ID.

Use this tool to delete an existing tag in Asana by providing its unique global ID (tag_gid). This operation is permanent and should be used when a tag is no longer needed.

parameters.name: tag_unique_identifier
parameters.description: The globally unique identifier for the Asana tag to be deleted.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the tag.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to true for formatted JSON output with line breaks and indentation. Use mainly for debugging as it increases response size.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.description:

parameters.name: tag_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the tag.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the tag.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
